Durch den Zusammenstoß mit dem Auto erlitt der Biker dennoch eine Verletzung am Beim und musste in einer Klinik behandelt werden.
output: Through the collision with the car the biker suffered, however, an injury on his leg and had to be treated in a hospital.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mamming: Corona-Masseninfektion: 174 Erntehelfer angesteckt
output: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvesters infected

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nach einer Corona-Masseninfektion auf einem großen Gemüsehof im niederbayerischen Mamming stehen fast 500 Menschen unter Quarantäne und dürfen den Betrieb nicht mehr verlassen.
output: After a Corona mass infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people have been quarantined and are not allowed anymore to leave the operations.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ein Sicherheitsdienst überwacht das Ausgehverbot.
output: A security service monitors the curfew.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Insgesamt 174 Erntehelfer wurden bei der Reihenuntersuchung positiv auf den Corona-Erreger Sars-CoV-2 getestet, wie das Landratsamt Dingolfing-Landau am Samstagabend mitteilte.
output: Altogether 174 harvesters were tested positive for the Corona virus Sars-CoV-2 at a mass screening as the district administration Dingolfing-Landau announced on Saturday evening.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Um eine weitere Ausbreitung zu vermeiden, müssen wir zum Schutz der Bevölkerung leider diesen Schritt gehen", erklärte Landrat Werner Bumeder (CSU).
output: “In order to avoid a further spreading we unfortunately must take this measure to protect the population”, county commissioner Werner Bumeder (CSU) explained.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Zuvor hatten sich in dem Betrieb bereits sieben Mitarbeiter infiziert - dies war der Anlass des Reihentests.
output: Before that already seven coworkers had been infected on this farm - this triggered the mass screening.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bei dem Betrieb handelt es sich um einen großen Gemüsehof, der Erdbeeren, Gurken, Kohl und Rote Bete anbaut - die Gurken aber nur für Einlegegläser.
output: The operations concern a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - however the cucumbers only for canning jars.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mamming ist eine ländliche Gemeinde mit gut 3300 Einwohnern unweit von Dingolfing mit seinem großen BMW-Werk.
output: Mamming is a rural community with about 3300 residents not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW factory.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bumeder appellierte an die Bürger, Ruhe zu bewahren: "Nach unseren Informationen handelt es sich um einen geschlossenen Personenkreis".
output: Bumeder called on the citizens to keep calm: “According to our information it concerns a closed group of persons.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auf dem Hof wurden infizierte von nicht infizierten Mitarbeitern getrennt, das Gelände ist nun von einem Absperrzaun umgeben.
output: On the farm infected coworkers were separated from non-infected ones, the premises are now fenced in with a construction fence.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Grüne und SPD gaben der Staatsregierung Mitverantwortung.
output: Greens and SPD blamed the State government for shared responsibility.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die zwei Oppositionsfraktionen warfen Ministerpräsident Markus Söder (CSU) und seinem Kabinett vor, die Kontrolle der Unterkünfte von Saisonarbeitern zu vernachlässigen.
output: Both opposition parties accused prime minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet to neglect monitoring the housing for seasonal workers.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Das kann sich bitter rächen, wenn solche lokalen Infektionsgeschehen ausgreifen und regionale Lockdowns angeordnet werden müssen", sagte Jürgen Mistol, der parlamentarische Geschäftsführer der Grünen.
output: “That can backfire horribly when such local infections spread and regional lockdowns must be ordered”, said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary manager of the Greens.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das sieht die SPD ganz ähnlich: "Wir haben nach dem Corona-Ausbruch in dem Wiesenhof-Schlachthof Mitte Mai bereits ein Sonderkontrollprogramm auch für Bauernhöfe mit Erntehelfern gefordert", sagte Umweltexperte Florian von Brunn.
output: The SPD shares a similar view: “We have asked for a special control program also for farms with harvesters after the Corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse mid May”, said the environmental expert Florian von Brunn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Gerade die Hygienebedingungen am Arbeitsplatz und die Wohnverhältnisse müssen aus unserer Sicht scharf kontrolliert werden.
output: “Especially the hygiene conditions at the work place and the living quarters must - in our view - thoroughly checked.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das ist offensichtlich nicht passiert".
output: And that obviously did not happen.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Ausbruch sei "mit Ansage" gekommen.
output: The outbreak occurred “predictably”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
U-Bahnhof Aidenbachstraße: Gefährlicher Streit: 19-Jähriger fällt nach Schubser ins Gleisbett
output: U-Bahnhof Aidenbachstraße: Dangerous fight: A 19 year-old fell onto the track after being pushed

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bei einem Streit zwischen zwei Jugendgruppen am U-Bahnhof Aidenbachstraße ist ein 19-Jähriger durch einen Schubser hingefallen und ins Gleisbett gerutscht.
output: A 19 year-old fell onto the track after being pushed during a fight between two groups of young people at U-Bahnhof Aidenbachstraße.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Obersendling - Am Freitag ist es am U-Bahnhof Aidenbachstraße gegen 16.15 Uhr zu einem Streit zwischen zwei Jugendgruppen gekommen.
output: Obersendling - A fight broke out between two groups of young people at U-Bahnhof Aidenbachstraße at 16:15h on Friday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ein Passant alarmierte die Polizei, die mit mehreren Streifen anrückte.
output: A passerby called the police, who called-up multiple squad cars.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ersten Ermittlungen zufolge schubste ein Münchner (17) einen 19-Jährigen zu Boden.
output: Following initial investigations it seems a boy from Munich (17) pushed a 19 year-old to the floor.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Dabei rutschte der junge Mann über die Bahnsteigkante und fiel ins Gleisbett.
output: This resulted in the young man slipping over the edge of the platform and falling onto the track.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Personen aus der Gruppe des 17-Jährigen halfen dem Gestürzten aus dem Gleis zu klettern.
output: People in the 17 year-old’s party helped the fallen boy climb out of the track bed.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Gefahr durch eine einfahrende Bahn bestand nicht.
output: There was no danger of a passing train.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Wie die Polizei mitteilt, kam es danach wieder zu Auseinandersetzungen zwischen den beiden Personen.
output: Another scuffle followed between the two persons, according to the police.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der 17-Jährige floh zunächst vom Tatort, seine Personalien konnten aber im Nachhinein ermittelt werden.
output: The 17 year-old proceeded to flee the crime scene, however, his personal details could be retrieved later.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In Begleitung seines Vaters begab er sich zur Polizeiinspektion 29.
output: He reported to the 29th police station with his father.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Gegen den 17-Jährigen wird wegen Körperverletzung ermittelt.
output: Assault charges are being pursued against the 17 year-old.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bericht: Seehofer drängt auf längere Vorratsdatenspeicherung
output: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer telecommunications data retention

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Vorratsdatenspeicherung ist derzeit ausgesetzt.
output: Telecommunications data retention is currently suspended.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bundesinnenminister Horst Seehofer fordert nach einem Medienbericht allerdings eine Verlängerung der Speicherfrist.
output: However, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer is pushing for a lengthening of the retention period according to a press report.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er will damit den Kampf gegen Kindesmissbrauch stärken.
output: He would like to support thereby the fight against child abuse.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bundesinnenminister Horst Seehofer (CSU) fordert nach einem Medienbericht eine verlängerte Vorratsdatenspeicherung - statt den vorgesehenen zehn Wochen ein halbes Jahr.
output: According to a media report, Federal Minster of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) is pushing for a longer data retention period: a half-year instead of the current ten weeks.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Wie die "Bild am Sonntag" berichtet, bat Seehofer Justizministerin Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in einem Brief um eine schnelle Gesetzesänderung.
output: As reported by the “Bild am Sonntag”, Seehofer asked the Minister of Justice Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for an express change to the law.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Seehofer will demnach damit die Maßnahmen gegen Kindesmissbrauch verstärken.
output: Seehofer wants to strengthen provisions against child abuse thereby.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er halte es für sinnvoll, "dringend erforderliche Anpassungen im Gesetz bereits jetzt vorzunehmen", zitiert die Zeitung aus dem Schreiben.
output: He thinks that it makes sense “to take up pressing, necessary alterations to the law now,” the newspaper quoted from his release.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Derzeit ist die Vorratsdatenspeicherung ausgesetzt.
output: Telecommunications data retention is suspended at the moment.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Es wird eine Entscheidung des EuGH dazu erwartet.
output: This is waiting on a decision from the EuGH.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Seehofer aber will die Änderungen schon vorher, damit sie nach einem möglichen positiven Urteil sofort angewendet werden könnten, heißt es in dem Bericht weiter.
output: However, Seehofer wants the alterations earlier, so that as soon as a likely, positive judgement is handed down, it can be implemented immediately, the letter further stated.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ein Sprecher des Justizministeriums sagte der Zeitung, dass erst sinnvoll geprüft werden könne, ob es gesetzlicher Anpassungen bedarf, wenn die Gerichte entschieden hätten.
output: A spokesperson for the Ministry of Justice said to the newspaper, that the need for legal alterations shall first be sensibly reviewed following a decision from the court.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Im Kampf gegen Kindesmissbrauch und Kinderpornografie hatte sich Seehofer gemeinsam mit den Innenministern der Länder bereits im Juni für eine Vorratsdatenspeicherung ausgesprochen.
output: Already in June Seehofer spoke together with the interior ministers of the states in favor of telecommunications data retention in their fight against child abuse and child pornography.

Söder äußert sich nach Masseninfekton zur Corona-Lage
output: Söder comments on the Corona situation after mass infection.

München - Gesundheitsministerin Melanie Huml (CSU) hat am Sonntag bereits eine Testoffensive für große Bauernhöfe angekündigt.
output: Munich - Secretary of Health, Melanie Humi (CSU), already announced on Sunday a testing offensive for large farms.

Die Pressekonferenz wird auf unserer Homepage live zu sehen sein.
output: You can watch live the press conference on our homepage.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Fall in Mamming im Landkreis Dingolfing-Landau hat Behörden und Politik aufgeschreckt.
output: The case in Mamming, district Dingolfing-Landau, has alarmed authorities and politicians.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auf dem großen Gemüsebauernhof arbeiten derzeit fast 500 Erntehelfer aus mehreren Ländern, über ein Drittel hat sich mit dem Corona-Erreger infiziert.
output: On the large vegetable farm are currently working almost 500 harvesters from several countries; more than one third are infected with the Corona virus.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Hof steht mittlerweile unter Quarantäne und ist mit einem Bauzaun abgesperrt.
output: In the meantime the farm has been quarantined; the farm is blocked off with a construction fence.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Niemand darf das Gelände verlassen, Lebensmittel werden angeliefert.
output: Nobody may leave the premises, food is being delivered.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: The authorities are offering free of charge Corona tests to the about 3300 locals of the community.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Da die Erntehelfer wenig Kontakt zur ortsansässigen Bevölkerung hatten, geht das Landratsamt bisher davon aus, dass sich die Infektionen nicht über den Hof hinaus verbreitet haben.
output: Since the harvesters had little contact with the local residents the district administration assumes so far that infections have not spread beyond the farm.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Gewissensbisse": Geständnis des mutmaßlichen Brandstifters von Nantes
output: “The Pain of Remorse”: Confession from the suspected arsonist of Nantes

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Mein Mandant hat sich kooperativ gezeigt", sagte der Anwalt Quentin Chabert der Zeitung.
output: “My client has shown himself to be very cooperative,” the Lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Verteidiger fügte hinzu: "Er bedauert die Taten sehr, das Geständnis war für ihn eine Befreiung".
output: The defense counsel added: “He regrets his actions very much, the confession was liberating for him.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Sein Mandat sei "von Gewissensbissen geplagt und von dem Ausmaß der Zerstörung sehr mitgenommen".
output: His client was “plagued with remorse and really taken back by the extent of the damage”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Im Falle einer Verurteilung drohen dem Mann laut Staatsanwaltschaft zehn Jahre Haft und eine Geldstrafe in Höhe von 150.000 Euro.
output: In the case of a verdict, the man is looking at ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros according to the prosecution.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die gotische Sankt-Peter-und-Paul-Kathedrale in Nantes war in der Nacht auf Samstag vergangener Woche bei einem Brand schwer beschädigt worden.
output: The gothic Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul of Nantes was heavily damaged after a fire last Saturday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Feuer war an drei weit voneinander entfernten Stellen in der Kirche ausgebrochen.
output: The fire broke out in three places in the church, which were at a considerable distance from one another.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Laboruntersuchungen erhärteten den Verdacht auf Brandstiftung.
output: Laboratory investigations corroborated the suspicion of arson.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der nun inhaftierte Verdächtige war bereits wenige Stunden nach dem Brand festgenommen worden.
output: The detained suspect was already arrested just a few hours after the incident.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er wurde nach einem Tag aber wieder freigelassen.
output: However, he was let go after just a day.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Mann arbeitet als Freiwilliger für die Diözese Nantes und war am Vorabend des Brandes für die Schließung der Kathedrale verantwortlich.
output: The man was a volunteer for the Nantes diocese and was responsible for closing down the cathedral the night of the fire.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Da es keine Spur für ein gewaltsames Eindringen in die Kirche gab, geriet er rasch ins Blickfeld der Ermittler.
output: Because there was no sign of a violent break-in to the church, he was quickly under the eye of the investigator.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Über Abschaffung der 50+1-Regel diskutieren
output: Discussions over abolishing the 50+1 rule

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der frühere DFB-Präsident Reinhard Grindel hat empfohlen, über die Abschaffung der 50+1-Regel nachzudenken.
output: The former DFB president Reinhard Grindel recommended discussions about phasing out the 50+1 rule.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Der deutsche Fußball sollte zumindest diskutieren, Bedingungen und klare Regeln für Investoren festzulegen, bevor die EU-Kommission vollendete Tatsachen schafft", sagte Grindel der "Bild am Sonntag".
output: “German Football should at least discuss setting clear rules and requirements for investors before the EU Commission finishes up with all of the details,” Grindel told the “Bild am Sonntag”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er betonte: "Für die Vereine, die am ehesten Bayern und Dortmund gefährlich werden können, wirken die 50+1-Regeln ohnehin nicht: siehe Leipzig oder Leverkusen.
output: He continued: “The 50+1 rules don’t work at all for the clubs that would most likely be a danger to Dortmund and Bayern: just look at Leipzig and Leverkusen.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Insofern kommt man um die Debatte nicht herum, ob es nicht geboten ist, Vereinen, die in diese Phalanx einbrechen wollen, die Einbeziehung von Investoren zu erleichtern".
output: In this respect, there is no getting around the debate as to whether to make it easier for clubs, which want to break into this Phalanx, to include investors.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er habe aber Zweifel, ob es in der Deutschen Fußball Liga die Bereitschaft gebe, Mehrheitsbeteiligungen zuzulassen, die in der Bundesliga durch die 50+1-Regel untersagt sind.
output: He has doubts, however, about whether the German Football League is ready to allow majority stakes, which are prevented in the league by the 50+1 rule.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Es bleibt ein juristisches Risiko, in einem europäischen Binnenmarkt Investitionszäune um den Wirtschaftsstandort Bundesliga zu ziehen", sagte Grindel.
output: “There is a judicial risk in putting up investment barriers around the Bundesliga’s business locations in the European Single Market,” said Grindel.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der ehemalige DFB-Chef sieht die Gefahr, dass "die Versuche, für mehr Wettbewerbsbalance in der Bundesliga zu sorgen, am Ende nur die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit unserer Top-Clubs auf europäischer Ebene schwächen, aber nicht zu mehr Spannung in der Meisterschaft führen".
output: The former DFB head sees a danger that “the attempt to secure fairer competition in the Bundesliga would only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs on the European level, and not lead to more excitement in the championship”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Selbst eine Gleichverteilung der TV-Gelder werde keinen entscheidenden Effekt erzielen.
output: Even distribution of TV funds would not even produce a decisive result.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Der FC Bayern macht einen Umsatz von 750 Millionen Euro, Borussia Dortmund von 500 Millionen und RB Leipzig von 300 Millionen.
output: “FC Bayern has a revenue of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig a revenue of 300 million.

instruction:

output: The difference even between the top three clubs is already immense.

output: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of about 130 million,” clarified the 58 year-old.

instruction:

output: Grindel feels betrayed when looking back at the past.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: “Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this error and have leaked it to the press instead of bringing it to me directly,” Grindel said referring to the acceptance of an expensive watch, which lead to his resignation in 2019.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Das hat mich menschlich schon sehr beschäftigt".
output: “The morality of that has weighed heavy on my mind”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: The 11,000 euro watch was a gift from a Ukrainian official.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Ich habe einen Compliance-Verstoß begangen, und es war richtig, daraus die Konsequenzen zu ziehen", sagte Grindel.
output: “I committed a breach in compliance, and it was right that I reap the consequences of that,” said Grindel.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Mit dem ominösen Uhrengeschenk bin ich völlig transparent und arglos umgegangen.
output: “I circumvented innocently and with complete transparently with the ominous watch gift.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Es wussten ja viele im DFB davon".
output: Many in the DFB knew about this”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er habe nie "einen Hehl aus dem Geschenk gemacht", versicherte der 58-Jährige.
output: He never “made a secret out of the present,” reassured the 58 year-old.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Das mag man naiv nennen, jedenfalls war diese Form der Transparenz das komplette Gegenteil von Korruption".
output: “One could call it naive but this form of transparency was the exact opposite of corruption.”

instruction:

"Black Lives Matter": Verletzte und ein Toter
output: “Black Lives Matter”: Many injured and one dead

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Proteste gegen Polizeigewalt in den Vereinigten Staaten haben sich durch Donald Trumps Einsatz von Bundespolizisten in mehreren Städten wieder zugespitzt.
output: Protests against police brutality in the United States have picked up again after Donald Trump’s use of federal forces in multiple cities.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Am Samstag kam es in verschiedenen Städten zu Zusammenstößen zwischen Demonstranten und Polizisten.
output: It came to clashes between demonstrators and police in various cities on Saturday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In Louisville wurden dabei drei Menschen verletzt, in Seattle 16 Menschen festgenommen.
output: Three people were injured in Louisville; in Seattle, 16 people were arrested.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In Austin wurde eine Person durch Schüsse getötet, während ein Demonstrationszug gerade eine Kreuzung überquerte.
output: One person died from a gunshot in Austin as a line of protestors were marching over a crossing.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Zuvor war es in Portland während Protesten gegen Rassismus und Polizeigewalt abermals zu Zusammenstößen gekommen.
output: It has come to clashes multiple times during protests against racism and police violence in Portland in the past.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Sicherheitskräfte, darunter Beamte der Bundespolizei, setzten in der Nacht zum Samstag Tränengas ein und trieben Demonstranten gewaltsam auseinander.
output: Security forces, including representatives of the federal police, used tear gas on Saturday night and violently pushed demonstrators apart.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Hunderte, teils bewaffnete Demonstranten marschierten am Samstag durch Louisville in Kentucky und forderten, dass die Verantwortlichen für den Tod von Breonna Taylor zur Verantwortung gezogen werden sollten.
output: Hundreds, at times armed, demonstrators marched on Saturday through Louisville in Kentucky and pressed for those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be put to justice.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die 26 Jahre alte Studentin war im März bei einer Drogenrazzia in ihrer Wohnung in Louisville erschossen worden.
output: The 26 year-old student was shot to death in her apartment in Louisville during a drug raid in March.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ziel der Razzia war jemand anderer, der gar nicht dort wohnte, und es wurden auch keine Drogen gefunden.
output: The target of the raid was someone who didn’t even live there and no drugs were found on the scene.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Als am Samstag ein Mitglied einer Gruppe, die sich selbst als bewaffnetes Bündnis schwarzer Amerikaner bezeichnet, einen Schuss abgab, wurden drei Personen verletzt.
output: Three people were injured as a member of a group, who describe themselves as an armed group of black Americans, let out a shot.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nach Angaben des Senders NBC wurden sie ins Krankenhaus gebracht.
output: They were brought to the hospital according to reports from broadcaster NBC.

instruction:

output: None of them were in danger of losing their lives.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: Police put up barricade after a counter-protest of white militia men also formed.

instruction:

output: In the end, it never came to a confrontation between the two groups.

instruction:

Im texanischen Austin wurde eine Person im Zuge einer "Black Lives Matter"-Demonstration erschossen und verstarb.
output: In Austin, Texas someone marching in a “Black Lives Matter” demonstration was shot and killed.

instruction:

Die Polizei nahm nach eigenen Angaben einen Verdächtigen in Gewahrsam.
output: According to their own releases, the police have a suspect in custody.

instruction:

Nähere Angaben zu den Umständen der Tat machte sie bislang nicht.
output: They have made no further statements concerning the circumstances of the crime.

instruction:

output: According to the “New York Times”, Mayor Steve Adler let it be known that like many in the city he was “speechless and inconsolable” about what had happened.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auch in der amerikanischen Metropole Seattle lieferten sich Demonstranten am Samstag Zusammenstöße mit der Polizei.
output: In the American metropolis of Seattle demonstrators also ran into clashes with police on Saturday.

instruction:

Sie steckten vor einem Jugendgefängnis Bauwagen in Brand, die Polizei setzte Blendgranaten und Pfefferspray ein.
output: They set construction trailers on fire in front of a youth detention center, the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.

instruction:

Nach Angaben der "Seattle Times" wurden 16 Menschen wegen Widerstands gegen Polizisten oder Körperverletzung festgenommen.
output: According to the “Seattle Times”, 16 people were taken in for resisting arrested and assault.

output: A courthouse was set on fire in Oakland, California.

instruction:

output: A small group of demonstrators broke in windows, lit off fireworks and blinded police with lasers, reported Oakland Police late Saturday evening (local time).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Feuer konnte rasch wieder gelöscht werden.
output: The fire could quickly be put out.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In Aurora, einem Vorort von Denver in Colorado, fuhr ein Auto durch eine Menschenmenge, die auf einer Autobahn demonstrierte.
output: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd of people who were protesting on the highway.

output: As the police report it, one of the demonstrators fired a weapon and at least one person was injured, brought to the hospital.

output: Apart from that, the window of a courthouse was also broken in and a fire started, according to police.

instruction:

Ermittlungen wurden aufgenommen.
output: Investigations have been taken up.

output: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historic costumes in spite of corona

output: But: Even though the great party mile in the city center was missing, including the crowds and program highlights like the burning of the Saale, the Rakoczy Ball or the parade, many still came in their costumes to the corona-conforming alternative program.

output: “I think we still succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair,” said the Kurstadt director, Sylvie Thormann.

Angenehme Atmosphäre

output: However, she did miss the rest of the program highlights, most of all the burning of the Saale on Friday evening as well as the historic parade and the concluding fireworks on Sunday evening.

instruction:

"Das ist schon schade.
output: “It is a shame.

Das Wetter hätte dieses Jahr super gepasst", meint sie.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
28 Corona-Fälle bei spanischem Zweitligisten Fuenlabrada
output: 28 corna cases for the Spanish second-league club Fuenlabrada

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: The Spanish football second-league club CF Fuenlabrada are sliding even deeper into crises following a corona outbreak.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Seit der Neuling aus der Nähe von Madrid trotz erster Corona-Fälle am 20. Juli zu einem Spiel in die Stadt A Coruña geflogen war, folgt ein Tiefschlag dem nächsten.
output: One heavy blow has followed the next since the newcomer from the area around Madrid flew to the city of A Coruña to a game on the 20th of July in spite of their first corna case.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: The club reported that 28 players tested positive for corna as of Sunday, one was taken to the hospital.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: Fuenlabrada from the titular city south-west of Madrid still had the chance to make the advancement playoffs.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nun droht sogar der Abstieg in die B-Gruppe der Zweiten Liga.
output: Now a fallback to the B group of the second-league is a very real possibility.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: The game against Deportivo La Coruña on the previous Monday was cancelled in the last moments, the state prosecution was investigating a possible offense against public health, CSD, the highest sport authority, pondered a forced degrading of the club.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: The players as well as all team members are sitting in a hotel in quarantine.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: “Up to six days of quarantine and they have not received a fresh towel or any gel,” wrote the sports newspaper “AS”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auf Fotos sei zu sehen, wie Spieler Unterwäsche und Clubkleidung in ihren Zimmern im Hotel zum Trocknen aufgehängt hätten, nachdem sie die offenbar selbst waschen mussten.
output: Photos are seen of how the players are hanging underwear and club clothes in their rooms in the hotel to dry after they apparently had to wash them themselves.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auch sei die Bettwäsche fünf Tage lang nicht gewechselt worden.
output: The bedding has also not been changed for five days.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ein weiteres Problem sei das Essen.
output: Food is yet another problem.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Weder sei es gut noch ausreichend, schrieb "AS".
output: It is neither good nor enough, writes “AS”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Clubleitung teilte hingegen mit, man sei zufrieden mit dem Hotel.
output: The club management on the other hand say they are happy with hotel management.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Den Vorwurf, die öffentliche Gesundheit vorsätzlich gefährdet zu haben, wies der Rechtsanwalt des Clubs, Javier Tebas Llanas, zurück.
output: The claim, that they intentionally harmed public health, is rejected by the club’s lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas.

instruction:

output: No one breached corona regulations as laid out by the football association, said the son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, as the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper “Marca” reported.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Vor dem Abflug habe es bis zum 19. Juli vier Infizierte gegeben, die aber alle isoliert gewesen und nicht mitgereist seien.
output: Before departure there had been four infections up to the 19th of July, all of them were isolated and did not travel along.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Direkt vor dem Flug am Montag nach A Coruña seien alle Spieler und Teammitglieder erneut getestet worden.
output: Right before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members were tested again.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Als die Mannschaft schon in A Coruña war, seien dann bei "fünf oder sechs" weiteren Teammitgliedern der Corona-Test positiv gewesen.
output: As the team arrived in A Coruña, there were “five or six” further team members who had positive results from the corona test.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Spiel wurde 60 Minuten vor dem Anpfiff abgesagt, sagte Tebas Llanas.
output: The game was cancelled 60 minutes before the whistle blow, said Tebas Llanas.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Polizei muss bei Dampfach ausgerissene Pferde einfangen
output: The police must ring in runaway horses near Dampfach

Translate the following text from German to English:
Zwei Tiere waren auf der Straße unterwegs.
output: Two animals were making their way down the street.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Polizei führte sie zurück zu ihrem Besitzer.
output: The police were leading them back to their owners.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Am Sonntagmorgen kurz vor 6 Uhr teilte ein Verkehrsteilnehmer zwei freilaufende Pferde auf dem Zubringer zwischen der Einmündung Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld und der Autobahnanschlussstelle Theres mit.
output: Shortly before 6 on Sunday morning, a commuter reported two free-walking horses on the feeder road between the junction Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld and the autobahn junction Theres.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bei Eintreffen der Beamten befanden sich die Pferde bereits wieder zwischen dem Zubringer und der Ortschaft Dampfach.
output: When the authorities arrived, the horses were again located between the feeder road and Dampfach village.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nachdem kurz vor Dampfach durch die Beamten das Vertrauen der Pferde gewonnen werden konnte, ließen diese sich jeweils ein im Streifenwagen mitgeführtes Seil umlegen.
output: After the authorities were able to win the trust of the horses directly before reaching Dampfach, they both allowed themselves to be connected to a rope that was carried along in the patrol car

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Radprofi Tony Martin: Karriere-Fortsetzung vorstellbar
output: Bike professional Tony Martin: Continuing carrier is possible

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Zeitfahrspezialist Tony Martin denkt über eine Fortsetzung seiner Karriere nach.
output: The time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his carrier.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Frankfurt/Main - Der siebenmalige Zeitfahrweltmeister Tony Martin kann sich durchaus vorstellen, seine Radsport-Karriere fortzusetzen.
output: Frankfurt/Main - The seven-time time trial specialist Tony Martin can clearly picture continuing his bicycling carrier.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Ich stecke gerade mit dem Team die Rahmenbedingungen ab, wie und in welcher Form es weitergehen könnte", sagte der 35-Jährige der "Frankfurter Allgemeinen Sonntagszeitung".
output: “I am getting the broad strokes of it straight with my team: how and in what form in can continue,” the 35 year-old told the “Frankfurter Allgemeinen Sonntagszeitung.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Martin ist derzeit beim niederländischen Team Jumbo-Visma angestellt und hatte vor der Corona-Pause in Erwägung gezogen, seine Laufbahn nach diesem Jahr zu beenden.
output: Martin is now a member of the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and he was considering ending his run at the end of this year before the start of the corna virus pandemic.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bei den Verhandlungen mit seinem Team gehe es auch um die Anzahl der Renntage, sagte er.
output: The number of riding days is the subject being discussed by his team, he said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Oder um andere Probleme, die ihn als Familienvater plagen würden, meinte Martin.
output: Or it’s about other problems bothering him as a father, he continued.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Früher sei er nach einem Sturz aufgestanden, und der erste Gedanke sei gewesen: "Schnell wieder zurück aufs Rad.
output: After a fall his first thought used to be: “Hurry get back up on the bicycle.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Heute denke ich als Vater einer kleinen Tochter: Was wäre, wenn".
output: Now I am thinking as a father of a small daughter: what would happen, if...”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Radprofi räumte ein, dass es durchaus Aspekte gebe, mit denen er sich zunehmend schwer tue.
output: The bicycling professional granted that there were many aspects, which have been hard on him.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Aber es tat mir gut, anhand von der Corona-Zeit zu merken, was ich am Radsport habe und wie viel Spaß er mir macht".
output: “But it was good for me during this corna time to notice how much I have with bicycling and how much fun it was for me”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Zeitfahrspezialist steigt bei der Tour de l'Ain (5. bis 9. August) wieder ins Wettkampf-Geschehen ein.
output: The time-travel specialist gets back into a competitive event with the Tour de l’Ain (5th to 9th of August).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bayern: Mindestens vier Tote auf Bayerns Straßen am Wochenende
output: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria’s streets this weekend

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das schöne Wetter lockt vielerorts Biker auf die Straßen.
output: The beautiful weather brought bikers to the streets in many places.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Für mindestens drei Menschen endet die Tour mit dem Motorrad tödlich.
output: The motorcycle tour ended in death for at least three people.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auch ein 18 Jahre alter Fußgänger stirbt.
output: An 18 year-old pedestrian died as well.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Schönthal - Bei Unfällen auf Bayerns Straßen sind am Wochenende mehrere, zumeist junge Menschen gestorben.
output: Schönthal - Accidents on Bavaria’s streets this weekend lead to multiple, mostly young deaths.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Eine 18 Jahre alte Motorradfahrerin wurde am Samstag bei Schönthal (Landkreis Cham) von einem Auto erfasst, das auf die Gegenspur kam.
output: An 18 year-old motorcyclist was taken over by a car on Saturday by Schönthal (Cham County) that was coming from the opposite direction.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Warum der Wagen auf die Gegenspur geriet, war zunächst unklar.
output: The reason for the car veering into oncoming traffic is unclear.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In Oberbayern stieß am Samstag ein 22-Jähriger auf seiner Maschine mit einer Pferdekutsche zusammen.
output: In Upper Bavaria, a 22 year-old on his machine collided with a horse-and-carriage on Saturday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er war laut Polizei bei Beilngries bergab unterwegs.
output: According to police he was heading down the mountain near Beilngries.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In einer Linkskurve prallte er gegen die Kutsche.
output: He smashed into the carriage as the road curved to the left.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Seine Verletzungen waren so schwer, dass er am Unfallort starb.
output: His injuries were so severe that he died on the site of the accident.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Von den zwölf Insassen der Kutsche wurde ein Mann schwer und ein Mann leicht verletzt, wie die Polizei mitteilte.
output: According to police, one man was severely injured and another lightly injured of the twelve who were sitting in the carriage.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bei einem weiteren tödlichen Unfall starb im oberpfälzischen Bad Kötzting ein 18-Jähriger.
output: An 18 year-old died following a further lethal accident in Bad Kötzting (Rhineland-Palatinate).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er hatte sich in der Nacht zum Sonntag auf eine Straße gelegt und wurde von einem 42 Jahre alten Autofahrer überrollt.
output: On Sunday night he laid down on the street and was run over by a 42 year-old.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nach Vermutung der Polizei wollte der 18-Jährige schlafen.
output: The police suspect that the 18 year-old had meant to sleep.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Autofahrer konnte nicht mehr rechtzeitig bremsen.
output: The driver of the vehicle could not stop in time.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bei Schönberg (Landkreis Freyung-Grafenau) prallte am Samstag ein 57 Jahre alter Biker in einer Rechtskurve trotz Vollbremsung frontal gegen ein Auto.
output: A 57 year-old motorcyclist crashed head-on into a car in spite of reaching a full stop on a right curve in Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau County).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er starb am Unfallort.
output: He died at the site of the accident.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die 57-jährige Fahrerin erlitt einen Schock, die übrigen drei Personen im Auto blieben unverletzt.
output: The 57 year-old driver suffered shock, the other three people in the car remain uninjured.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Sicherheit von Motorradfahrern wurde am Samstag von Bayerns Verkehrsministerin Kerstin Schreyer (CSU) thematisiert.
output: The safety of motorcycle drivers was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria’s Minister of Transportation Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In einem Brief an den Organisator der für August angekündigten Biker-Proteste gegen Fahrverbote, Gabor Kovacs, verwies die Ministerin auf umfangreichen Investitionen wie Unterfahrschutz an Leitplanken und die Entschärfung gefährlicher Kurven.
output: In a letter to the organizer of a planned August biker protest against driving restrictions, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments like underride guards for crash barriers and the mitigating of dangerous curves.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Für die Sicherheit der Motorradfahrer haben wir damit in den vergangenen Jahren viel erreicht", hieß es in dem Schreiben.
output: “We have done a lot in past years to promote the security of motorcyclists,” it read in the letter.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Die Zahl der getöteten motorisierten Zweiradfahrer reduzierte sich gegenüber dem Jahr 2011 um rund 28 Prozent".
output: “The number of dead two-wheel motor vehicle drivers has been reduced by 28 percent since 2011.”

instruction:

output: Kovac is tested by Monaco against Frankfurt

output: Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - There will already be a reunion for football trainer Niko Kovac when his new club AS Monaco plays Eintracht Frankfurt.

output: The eight-time French champion will be a guest on the 1st of August (18h) in Hesse, the former club of the Croatian.

output: It is the first and only hardness test for the Bundesliga club before the return match against FC Basel in the Europe League (6th of August).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Wegen der Coronavirus-Pandemie wird die Begegnung ohne Zuschauer ausgetragen.
output: Because of the corna virus epidemic, the match will be carried out without spectators.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Wir freuen uns besonders auf dieses Spiel.
output: “We are especially excited about this game.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Es ist immer wieder schön, nach Frankfurt zu kommen und Freunde zu treffen", erklärte Kovac.
output: It is always wonderful to come back to Frankfurt again and to meet friends,” said Kovac.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Sportlich sei das ein interessanter Test, sagte der 48-Jährige.
output: This is an interesting test from an athletics perspective, the 48 year-old said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Vor seinem Wechsel zum FC Bayern München hatte Kovac die Hessen von 2016 bis 2018 trainiert und zum Sieg im DFB-Pokal geführt.
output: Before he transferred to FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had trained Hesse from 2016 to 2018 and lead it to a victory in the DFB Pokal.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Ein hochkarätiger Gegner wie Monaco ist ein guter Test für uns im Hinblick auf das Spiel gegen Basel.
output: “A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us considering the upcoming game against Basel.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Wie alle Frankfurter freue ich mich auf das Wiedersehen mit Niko Kovac", sagte Eintracht-Trainer Adi Hütter.
output: Like all people from Frankfurt, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again,” said Adi Hütter, the trainer for Eintracht.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der 50 Jahre alte Österreicher hatte bei der Eintracht die Nachfolge des Kroaten angetreten.
output: The 50 year-old Austrian stepped up for Eintracht to be the successor of the Croatian.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Im März hatten die Frankfurter das Achtelfinal-Hinspiel gegen Basel im eigenen Stadion mit 0:3 verloren.
output: In March, Frankfurt lost 0:3 in the last 16 game against Basel in their own stadium.

instruction:

output: In Hof County the number of known corna infections increased even more over the weekend: from 39 on Friday to 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.

Dazu kommt ein Fall in der Stadt Hof.

output: The area of Hof has thereby almost reached the critical limit of 50 infections per 100,000 people.

output: Severe flooding in Southeast Asia has affected more than 9 million people, mostly in Bangladesch, India and Nepal.

output: A total of 700 people lost their life because of the strong monsoon rains.

output: The Red Crescent strove to reach isolated people in boats.

Die Bauern haben ihre Ernten verloren.
output: The farmers have left their crops.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Panzernashörner in Nationalpark sterben durch Erdrutsche
output: Indian rhinoceroses are dying in national parks because of landslides

output: More than 120 Indian rhinoceroses died following landslides in Kaziranga National Park.

output: They are a protected species and in danger of extinction.

In diesem Jahr sind die Fluten besonders schlimm, was Wissenschaflter auf den Klimawandel zurückführen.
output: The floods were especially bad this year, which scientists have connected to climate change.

output: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries hardest hit by global warming.

Neue Wohnungen stehen leer

output: In the south of Bangladesh, the city of Cox’s Bazar built living spaces for 650 people affected by the flood.

Bisher sind nur wenige eingezogen.
output: Only a few have moved in at this time.

Translate the following text from German to English:
Es ist schwierig, die Menschen nach Cox's Bazar zu bringen.
output: It is hard to get people to Cox’s Bazar.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auch hält sich die Begeisterung in Grenezn.
output: Many are keeping their excitement within bounds.

Translate the following text from German to English:

output: People who previously had a house, even if it was small and resembled a hut, will often not want to spend their lives in large apartment blocks.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Viele Wohnungen stehen leer, sollen aber - so will es die Regierung - bald von denen bezogen werden, die ihr Haus durch die Überschwemmungen verloren haben.
output: Many apartments are empty, but they should be filled soon by people who have lost their homes to the flooding, at least the government would like it that way.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
60 Corona-Neuinfektionen an nur einem Tag in Wien
output: 60 Corona new infections in only one day in Vienna.

Translate the following text from German to English:

output: In a 24 hour comparison 60 Corona new infections were reported in Vienna - in Lower Austria there were 22 new infections.

output: The State health care department Vienna and the medical crisis unit of the city Vienna inform regularly about current case numbers and further important data about the Covid-19-virus: Status Sunday, July 26, 2020, 8:00 a.m. 4840 (+60) positive tests confirmed in Vienna.

instruction:

output: The number of deaths related to the virus is unchanged 204.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
4.090 (+48) Personen sind genesen.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
22 neue Coronavirus-Infektionen in Niederösterreich
output: 22 new Corona virus infections in Lower Austria.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Zahl der Coronavirus-Infektionen in Niederösterreich ist am Sonntag um 22 auf nunmehr 3.288 gestiegen.
output: The number of Corona virus infections in Lower Austria has increased by 22 to now 3288 on Sunday.

Ein Erkrankter ist nach Angaben des Sanitätsstabs neu genesen.

output: Currently there are 247 patients ill with Covid-19 in the federal state.

output: So far 147253 tests were performed.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
105 Menschen starben im Zusammenhang mit der Lungenkrankheit.
output: 105 people died in connection with the pulmonary disease.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Argentinien lehnt Gegenangebot der Gläubiger ab
output: Argentina declines creditors’ counteroffer.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die neuen Forderungen könnten nicht erfüllt werden, teilte das Wirtschaftsministerium in Buenos Aires am Samstag mit.
output: The Ministry of Economics in Buenos Aires said on Saturday that the new demands could not be met.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Das wäre nicht nur unverantwortlich, sondern auch ungerecht", hieß es in einer Stellungnahme.
output: “It would not only be irresponsible but also unjust” one statement read.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Während 50 Prozent der Kinder in Argentinien in Armut leben, können wir nicht die kurzfristigen Gewinne unserer Gläubiger erhöhen".
output: “We cannot increase the short-term profit of our creditors while 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Schulden der zweitgrößten Volkswirtschaft in Südamerika sind zu den aktuellen Bedingungen nicht mehr tragfähig.
output: The debts of the second-largest economy in South America are no longer sustainable under current conditions.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Deshalb fordert Argentinien von seinen privaten Gläubigern, auf einen Teil ihrer Forderungen von rund 66 Milliarden US-Dollar (rund 59 Milliarden Euro) zu verzichten.
output: That is why Argentina is asking its private creditors to forgive a portion of their circa 66 billion US dollar debt (about 59 billion euros).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Kommt es zu keiner Einigung, droht dem Land erneut die Staatspleite.
output: A government default is looming if no agreement is reached.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Es wäre der neunte Zahlungsausfall in der argentinischen Geschichte.
output: It would be the ninth default in Argentina's history.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Zuletzt hatten die Kreditgeber höhere Zinsen auf die Staatsanleihen und Änderungen an einigen Vertragsklauseln gefordert.
output: The creditors recently requested higher interest on government bonds and changes to individual clauses of the contract.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die argentinische Regierung hält allerdings an ihrem letzten Angebot fest und ist zu keinen weiteren Zugeständnissen bereit.
output: However, the government of Argentina is sticking to its last offer and did not provide further concessions.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Argentinien steckt in einer schweren Finanz- und Wirtschaftskrise.
output: Argentina is stuck in a severe financial and economic crises.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die Inflationsrate betrug zuletzt mehr als 50 Prozent.
output: The inflation rate was recently more than 50 percent.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Für das laufende Jahr rechnen Experten mit einem Rückgang der Wirtschaftskraft um rund zehn Prozent.
output: Experts are expecting a decline of economic strength of about ten percent in the coming year.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ende Mai hatte Argentinien Zinsforderungen in Höhe von 503 Millionen US-Dollar nicht beglichen und war dadurch in einen begrenzten Zahlungsausfall gerutscht.
output: At the end of May, Argentina had not settled interest claims of about 503 million US dollars and thereby slid into a limited default.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Beruflich angekommen - privat noch nicht
output: Professionally achieved - privately not there yet.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Es läuft supergut" - dieses Fazit zieht Dr. Stefanie Kramer nach ihren ersten Tagen im Notariat in Eggenfelden.
output: “Everything goes very well” - Dr. Stefanie Kramer concludes after er first days working in the notary’s office in Eggenfelden.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Am Ende ging alles ganz schnell: Mitte Mai hat Dr. Stefanie Kramer erfahren, dass sie in der Eggenfeldener Notariatsstelle die Nachfolge von Lutz Feller antreten wird.
output: In the end everything went very fast. Middle of May Dr. Stefanie Kramer had learned that she would be the successor of Lutz Feller in the notary’s office in Eggenfelden.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Schon sechs Wochen später, Anfang Juli, nahm die promovierte Juristin die Arbeit auf, das normale Tagesgeschäft läuft längst auf vollen Touren.
output: Already six weeks later in the beginning of July the graduated jurist started working, the normal daily work is already in full swing.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Privat muss ich allerdings noch ankommen", erklärt sie im Gespräch mit dem Rottaler Anzeiger und lacht.
output: “Privately, however, I still have to reach my goals”, says Stefanie in an interview with the Rottaler Anzeiger, and laughs.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die kurze Vorlaufzeit habe natürlich nicht gereicht, den Lebensmittelpunkt von Regensburg komplett nach Eggenfelden zu verlagern, berichtet die gebürtige Dingolfingerin.
output: Naturally, the short lead time was not enough to transfer the center of her life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden said Stefanie who was born in Dingolfing..

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Aktuell sei sie mit ihrem Mann, der in Regensburg als Richter am Landgericht tätig ist, auf der Suche nach einer passenden Wohnung oder einem Haus in der Stadt.
output: Currently she and her husband who is a judge at the district court in Regensburg were still searching for a suitable apartment or house in the city.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Zumindest habe ihr Mann noch kurzfristig Elternzeit beantragen können, um die Betreuung der beiden Töchter (3½ und 1½ Jahre alt) gewährleisten zu können.
output: At least, her husband were able to apply on short notice for parental time to be able to take care of their two daughters (3 1/2 and 1 1/2 years old).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Um nicht jeden Tag von Regensburg aus pendeln zu müssen, habe sie einstweilen auch eine Übernachtungsmöglichkeit bei ihren Eltern in Dingolfing, erklärt die 39-Jährige.
output: In order that she didn’t have to commute from Regensburg every day she found overnight accommodation at her parent’s house in Dingolfing, explained the 39 year old.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Aufgewachsen im Nachbarlandkreis, ist ihr die Stadt Eggenfelden natürlich schon lange ein Begriff.
output: Since she grew up in the neighboring county she is quite familiar with the town Eggenfelden.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Bei Besuchen vor Ort mit ihrer Familie in den vergangenen Monaten habe sie dann neuerlich festgestellt: "Eggenfelden ist eine richtig schöne Kleinstadt".
output: When she visited the town with her family in the past months she again realized: “Eggenfelden is a really beautiful town.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Umso mehr gefreut habe sie sich darüber, dass sie im Auswahlverfahren um die freie Stelle das Rennen gemacht habe.
output: Therefore she was so very pleased that she won the job in the selection process for the vacancy.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auch in Dr. Stefanie Kramers beruflichem Werdegang spielt ihre Heimat Niederbayern eine zentrale Rolle: Nach dem Jura-Studium in Passau leistete sie ihre Referendariatszeit und das 2. Staatsexamen in Regensburg ab.
output: Her homeland Lower Bavaria plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional carrier: After her law studies in Passau she completed her traineeship and her 2nd state examination in Regensburg.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nach mehreren Stationen als Notarassessorin, unter anderem in Rehau und Hof in Oberfranken, Babenhausen im Unterallgäu sowie Regensburg - in dieser Zeit schulterte sie auch "nebenbei" die Promotion in Arbeitsrecht - trat sie im Jahr 2012 ihre erste Stelle als Notarin in Rotthalmünster im Landkreis Passau an.
output: After several employments as notary assessor - among others in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in Lower Allgäu as well as in Regensburg - during this time she also - like ‘in passing’ - completed her doctorate in labor law and then started her first ‘real’ job as notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Im Jahr 2016 ging sie in Elternzeit, es folgte schließlich der Umzug nach Regensburg.
output: In 2016 she applied for parental time which was followed with her move to Regensburg.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Seither übernahm sie Vertretungsdienste in diversen Notariatsstellen.
output: Ever since then she accepted substitute services in several notary offices.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Als die Stelle in Eggenfelden wegen des nahenden Ruhestands von Lutz Feller ausgeschrieben gewesen sei, habe sie den richtigen Zeitpunkt für den vollen beruflichen Wiedereinstieg gekommen gesehen, erklärt die 39-Jährige.
output: When the vacancy in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller she anticipated the right time for a professional full re-entry had come, explained the 39 year old.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Team ihres Vorgängers, der künftig die Urlaubsvertretung in der Notariatsstelle übernimmt, hat Dr. Stefanie Kramer komplett übernommen - und hat gleich ein Lob für die Mannschaft der Kanzlei parat: "Es läuft supergut!"
output: Dr. Stefanie Kramer adopted the entire team of her predecessor who will become vacation replacement in the notary’s office - and she instantly had only praise for the notary office’s team: “It goes extremely well!”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Dass sie sich hier auf eingespielte Abläufe verlassen kann, macht es ihr leichter, sich um die anstehende Verlagerung des privaten Lebensmittelpunktes zu kümmern.
output: It makes it easier for her to be able to rely on established routines and thus to have time to taking care of the pending transfer of her private life center point.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In Sachen Kindergarten- respektive Krippenplätzen hat sie bereits Kontakt mit einer örtlichen Einrichtung aufgenommen.
output: Regarding kindergarten respectively nursery places she has already established contact with the local facilities.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Und klappt alles wie gewünscht, hofft sie, ihrem Hobby auch hier bald nachgehen zu können - und die schönsten Jogging-Strecken des Rottals kennenzulernen.
output: And if everything goes as desired she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby again - namely to learn about the most beautiful jogging areas of the Rottal.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
BVB plant zum Ligastart mit maximal 15.000 Zuschauern
output: BVB is planning to start the league launch with maximum 15,000 spectators.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Dortmund Das größte deutsche Fußball-Stadion in Dortmund wird zum Saisonstart im Fall einer Fan-Rückkehr nicht einmal zu 20 Prozent gefüllt sein.
output: Dortmund - The Dortmund’s football stadium, the largest in Germany, won’t even fill up to 20 percent capacity as fans return for the start of the season.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Aufgrund der Abstandsregelung, die zwingend einzuhalten ist, planen wir nach derzeitigem Stand mit 12.000 bis 15.000 Zuschauern", sagte Borussia Dortmunds Geschäftsführer Carsten Cramer dem "Tagesspiegel".
output: “Because of isolation regulations, which must be enforced, we are planning for 12,000 to 15,000 spectators as things stand now,” said Borussia Dortmund’s manager Carsten Cramer to “Tagesspiegel”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Normalerweise fasst die Arena in der Revierstadt bei Bundesliga-Spielen etwas mehr als 81.000 Zuschauer.
output: Normally, the arena in the Dortmund has more than 81,000 spectators during Bundesliga games.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In den durch die Corona-Pandemie verursachten Geisterspielen der vergangenen Saison waren dem BVB pro Partie rund vier Millionen Euro verloren gegangen.
output: Last season’s ghost games, a result of the corona pandemic, caused about 4 million euros in loses per game for the BVB.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der beim BVB für Marketing, Digitalisierung und Internationalisierung zuständige Cramer hofft, dass neben den normalen Zuschauerplätzen auch wieder einige der rund 4000 Plätze im Hospitality-Bereich geöffnet werden können: "Es ist selbstverständlich ein Schlag ins Kontor, wenn diese Einnahmen komplett wegbrechen".
output: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitalization and internationalization for BVB, hopes that the circa 4,000 seats in the hospitality area can be opened up, in addition to the normal spectator seats: “Obviously it is a blow to the business if this income is just completely lost”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Angesichts der anhaltenden Corona-Krise seien derzeit alle "gut beraten, erstmal eine stabile Seitenlange einzunehmen".
output: As a result of the ongoing corona crises, everyone is now “well advised to first get into a stable position.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Wenn es vielen Unternehmen nicht gut geht und 6,8 Millionen Menschen allein in Deutschland in Kurzarbeit sind, dann ist das Bedürfnis auf Unterhaltung begrenzt", erklärte Cramer.
output: Cramer explained, “if it is not going well for many companies (about 6.8 million people in Germany alone are on short-time work) then the need for entertainment is limited.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Dortmunder Marketing-Chef lobte die BVB-Profis für ihren Gehalts-Teilverzicht, der zur Überwindung der Krise beitragen soll: "Selbstverständlich wissen die Spieler, dass ihr Gehaltsverzicht einen anderen Effekt hat, als wenn wir 100 Leute, die im Merchandising arbeiten, auf Kurzarbeit setzen".
output: Dortmund’s head of marketing praised the BVB professionals for having part of their salary waved, which contributes to overcoming the crises: “Of course the players know, that by having part of their salary waved, it causes a much different effect than 100 people in merchandising having to be put on short-time work.”

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Winzige Wunder: Frühstart ins Leben mit ein paar Hundert Gramm
output: Small wonders: An early start to life with only a few hundred grams

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Kaum schwerer als ein Packerl Butter, gerade einmal drei Esslöffel Blut in seinem gesamten Körper: Das war Gabriel, als er geboren wurde - er wog exakt 273 Gramm.
output: Hardly heaver then a pack of butter with just three tablespoons of blood in his body: This was Gabriel at birth; he weighed exactly 273 grams.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Bub ist eines von rund 400 Frühchen, die jährlich an der Grazer Kinderklinik umsorgt werden.
output: The lad is just one of 400 early births that are cared for at the Grazer Primary Hospital every year.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ein Viertel von ihnen wiegt weniger als 1.500 Gramm, ein paar - wie Gabriel und seine Brüder Raphael und Michael - sind extreme Leichtgewichte mit nicht einmal einem Kilogramm Geburtsgewicht.
output: A fourth of them weigh less then 1,500 grams, a few are extremely light weight without even a kilogram at birth like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Sie sind so klein und so früh geboren, dass weder Lunge, noch Darm, noch Muskeln vollständig ausgebildet sind.
output: They are so small and born so early, that neither their lungs, their intestines nor their muscles are fully developed.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ihre Haut ist manchmal so zart, dass sie die Elektroden eines EKG verletzten könnten.
output: Their skin is sometimes so delicate that the electrodes from an ECG can harm it.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Und sie sind so winzig, dass sie zuweilen Puppenkleidung tragen und speziell für sie gefertigte Mini-Windeln.
output: They are so small that sometimes they wear puppy clothing and special mini diapers designed just for them.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Aber nicht so klein, dass sie nicht bei Stimme wären - "und wie", schmunzelt Berndt Urlesberger.
output: However, they are not so small that they don’t already have a voice, “and how’s that,” smirked Berndt Urlesberger.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Auch wenn sie natürlich nicht ganz so laut schreien wie große Babys".
output: “Even if they don’t scream as loudly as big babies, of course.”

output: When the whiteboard takes the stage

output: After the presentation the students could share their thoughts via Skype with the actress and director Winfried Tobias about that play and the performance.

output: The idea for the exhibition was born out of the current Corona situation.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Lehrerin Teresa Nar freute sich über die Bereicherung des Unterrichts.
output: Teacher Teresa Nar was happy about the lectures enrichment.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auch wenn sich am Schluss alle Beteiligten einig waren, dass die direkte Begegnung im Theater- und Bühnenraum noch zusätzliche Reize bieten würde, sieht man im Theater auch die Potenziale für den Kontakt in die Schulen.
output: At the end all participants agreed that the direct encounter in a theater and stage room would offer additional appeal but one also saw in the theater the potentials for the contact in schools.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Wenn wir den technischen Rahmen weiter verbessern, könnte das eine interessante Ergänzung zum Spielbetrieb werden", betonte Regisseur Winfried Tobias.
output: “When we further improve the technical framework this could become an interesting supplement of the ongoing theater operations”, emphasized director Winfried Tobias.

output: “Gone with the Wind”: Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead

output: The film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.

instruction:

Sie sei am Sonntag in Paris mit 104 Jahren eines natürlichen Todes gestorben, bestätigte ihre Sprecherin der Deutschen Presse-Agentur.
output: She died of a natural birth on Sunday in Paris at the age of 104, her spokesperson said to the German Press Agency.

output: Born to British parents in Tokyo, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a small child.

output: Warner Brothers film studio took her immediately under a seven year contract and she made it big alongside Eroll Flynn.

output: This show was a worldwide success.

output: She played with her long-term friend Bette Davis in “Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte”.

instruction:

Aus der Ehe mit dem Schriftsteller Marcus Goodrich (1946 bis 1953) ging der Sohn Benjamin hervor.
output: Her son Benjamin was born out of her marriage with the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953).

output: In the final game on the Rhine, their conquers suffered a defeat against the surprise duo Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde with 0:2 (17:21, 17:21).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Kalbitz-Rauswurf aus AfD bestätigt - FDP spricht von "Feigenblatt"
output: Kalbitz expulsion from the AfD is confirmed - FDP calls it ‘fig leaf’.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Ausschluss von Andreas Kalbitz aus der AfD ist aus Sicht der FDP nur ein "Feigenblatt" und ändert nichts am Charakter der Partei.
output: The expulsion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is - in the FDP’s view - only a ‘fig leaf’ and doesn’t change anything about the party’s character-

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Die AfD ist der parlamentarische Arm der Rechtsextremen in Deutschland.
output: “The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the right extremists in Germany.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Andreas Kalbitz ist nur Teil der Spitze des Eisberges der Radikalen in der AfD", sagte der FDP-Innenpolitiker Benjamin Strasser der Nachrichtenagentur dpa in Berlin.
output: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the top of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD”, said the FDP politician Benjamin Strasser, specialist for domestic affairs, to the news agency dpa in Berlin.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Bundesschiedsgericht der AfD hatte am Samstag in Stuttgart nach mehrstündiger Verhandlung den Ausschluss von Kalbitz bestätigt, den der Bundesvorstand im Mai mehrheitlich beschlossen hatte.
output: The AfD’s federal arbitration court had confirmed the exclusion of Kalbitz after several hours of hearing on Saturday in Stuttgart; the AfD’s federal board had decided the expulsion with majority in May.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Kalbitz ist Vorsitzender der AfD-Fraktion im Brandenburger Landtag.
output: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD fraction in the Brandenburg state parliament.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Wenn es der AfD wirklich darum gehen würde, Rechtsextremisten konsequent aus ihrer Partei zu entfernen, wären Funktionäre wie Björn Höcke sowie seine Anhänger längst ausgeschlossen worden", sagte Strasser.
output: “If the AfD is really concerned about removing right wing extremists from its party then officials like Björn Höcke and also his followers would have been expelled a long time ago”, said Strasser.

instruction:

"Dazu gibt es in der AfD jedoch keinen politischen Willen, weil der Rechtsextremismus mittlerweile zur Partei gehört".
output: “For that there is not political will apparent in the AfD because the right wing extremism belongs to the party by now.”

instruction:

output: Similar statements come from the CSU secretary general, Markus Blume: “That Andreas Kalbitz now remains expelled does not say anything and changes nothing”, he said to the “Welt am Sonntag”.

instruction:

"Es spricht vielmehr Bände, wie viele frenetische Unterstützer ein Rechtsextremer mitten in der AfD nach wie vor hat".
output: “It rather says a lot how many frenetic supporters a right wing extremist still has in the midst of the AfD.”

instruction:

Blume geht davon aus, dass die AfD bei Wahlen künftig wieder unter fünf Prozent landen wird.
output: Blume assumes that the AfD will land again below five percent in future elections.

instruction:

"Die Tage der AfD in den Parlamenten sind gezählt".
output: “AfD’s days in parliaments are numbered.”

instruction:

output: Kalbitz was spokesman of the ‘wing’ around the Thuringia AfD state and fraction chairman Björn Höcke that had been dissolve officially by now; the Office for the Protection of the Constitution ranks the movement as ‘severe right wing extremist attempt’.

output: In May the AfD federal board threw Kalbitz out of the party.

output: Reason for that was that Kalbitz did not inform the party when applying for membership about his earlier membership in the meanwhile forbidden “Heimattreuen Deutschen Jugend (HDJ) and with the ‘Republikaner’.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Kalbitz bestreitet die Mitgliedschaft in der HDJ.
output: Kalbitz denies his membership in the HDJ.

instruction:

output: The chairman of the left fraction in the Brandenburg Landtag, Sebastian Walter, also insisted that the decision of the federal arbitration court would not change the character of the AfD. “The wolf only ate chalk.

Die AfD bleibt eine rechtsextreme Partei, ob mit oder ohne Kalbitz".
output: The AfD remains a right extremist party whether with or without Kalbitz.”

output: This decision would neither weaken the federal party nor its right wing.

"Das Manöver der Meuthen-Truppe ist durchschaubar.
output: “The maneuvers of the Meuthen troop is transparent.

Man will einer weiteren Beobachtung durch den Verfassungsschutz entgehen und versucht, unter dem Radar durchzukommen", sagte Walter.
output: They want to escape further observations by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and they try to keep ‘under the radar’”, said Walter.

instruction:

"Die AfD wird die Geister, die sie rief, nicht los.
output: “The AfD can’t get rid of the ghosts it had called on.

output: An expulsion does still not anything”, was a comment of the Brandenburg SPD secretary general, Erik Stohn, about the decision in the case Kalbitz.
