output: Hurricane “Hanna” reaches Texas. Providing help impeded due to Corona

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Washington - Der erste Hurrikan der diesjährigen Saison über dem Atlantik ist in Texas auf Land gestoßen.
output: Washington - The first Hurricane of this year’s season over the Atlantic made landfall in Texas.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Lebensbedrohliche Überschwemmungen, starke Winde und heftige Regenfälle bedrohten nun Teile des US-Staats, teilte das Nationale Hurrikan-Zentrum der US-Klimabehörde NOAA in der Nacht auf Sonntag (Ortszeit) mit.
output: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rain now threatened parts of the US state, reported the National Hurricane Center of the US Climate Agency NOAA in the night before Sunday (local time).

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Gouverneur Greg Abbott rief für zahlreiche Bezirke den Notstand aus.
output: Governor Greg Abbott declared the state of emergency for numerous districts.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Die in Texas grassierende Corona-Pandemie erschwere die Arbeit der Helfer, sagte Abbott laut US-Medien weiter.
output: The Corona epidemic that rages in Texas, would impede the work of helpers, continued Abbott according to US media reports.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Evakuierte zur Vorsicht aufgerufen
output: Evacuated people were warned to be careful.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Jeder Hurrikan ist eine enorme Herausforderung", sagte Abbott laut der Zeitung "Houston Chronicle".
output: “Every hurricane poses an enormous challenge”, said Abbott according to the newspaper “Houston Chronicle”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mit Blick auf den Wirbelsturm in Texas fügte er hinzu: "Diese Herausforderung ist kompliziert und wird noch verschärft, wenn man bedenkt, dass er durch ein Gebiet fegt, das das am stärksten von Covid-19 betroffene Gebiet des Bundesstaates ist".
output: Glancing at the hurricane in Texas, he added: “This challenge is complicated and will still be intensified when one considers that the hurricane races through an area of the state that is hit hardest by the Corona-19 crisis”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nach Angaben der Johns-Hopkins-Universität sind in Folge der Corona-Pandemie bisher rund 5000 Menschen allein in Texas gestorben.
output: According to reports from the Johns-Hopkins-University, so far 5000 people have died in Texas alone due to the Corona epidemic.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Abbott rief Menschen, die ihre Häuser verlassen müssten, zu Vorsicht auf.
output: Abbott told the people who had to leave their homes to be careful.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Sie sollten Praktiken, "an die wir uns gewöhnt haben", nicht missachten, etwa das Tragen von Masken, sagte der Gouverneur laut dem Sender CBS.
output: They should not disregard practices - like wearing masks - “which they got used to”, said the governor according to the station CBS.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Es sei wichtig, dass alle Abstand hielten.
output: It would be important that all keep social distances.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Daher seien an einigen Orten auch Hotelzimmer bereitgestellt worden.
output: Therefore, in some locations hotel rooms had been provided.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Außerdem solle in Notunterkünften auf Corona getestet werden.
output: Beside that, Corona testing should be performed in emergency shelters.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Schäden waren zunächst nur aus der Küstenstadt Port Mansfield gemeldet worden.
output: Hurricane damages had so far only be reported from the coastal town Port Mansfield.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Sturmwarnung wieder zurückgenommen
output: Storm warning was cancelled

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mit Windgeschwindigkeiten von bis zu 150 Kilometer pro Stunde war "Hanna" laut Behördenangaben auf die Insel Padre Island unmittelbar vor der texanischen Küste auf Land getroffen.
output: According to official information “Hanna” had made landfall with wind speeds of up to 150 km/h on Padre Island directly in front of the Texan coast.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Tropensturm war zuvor zum Hurrikan der niedrigsten Stufe eins hochgestuft worden.
output: Before that the tropical storm was classified as hurricane of the lowest level one.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Für den Küstenabschnitt von Port Mansfield bis Sargent war zunächst eine Sturmflut-Warnung erlassen und später wieder zurückgenommen worden.
output: For the coastal regions Port Mansfield up to Sargent a storm surge warning had been issued which had been taken back later.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Behörden erwarteten eine Abschwächung, während "Hanna" weiter ins Landesinnere ziehe und auf den Nordosten Mexikos zusteuere.
output: Authorities expected a weakening while “Hanna” would travel further inland and take course to Mexico’s northeast.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Douglas" bewegt sich auf Hawaii zu
output: “Douglas” moves towards Hawaii

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Im Pazifik war Hurrikan "Douglas" in der Nacht auf Sonntag mit Windgeschwindigkeiten von rund 150 Kilometern pro Stunde in Richtung Hawaii unterwegs.
output: Hurricane “Douglas” was on its way in the Pacific Ocean with wind speeds of 150 km/h in the direction of Hawaii in the night before Sunday.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Hurrikan-Zentrum erwartete allerdings, dass er sich weiter abschwächt.
output: However, the hurricane center expected that this hurricane would weaken.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Vorhersage zufolge soll er am Sonntag (Ortszeit) in der Nähe der größten Inseln Hawaiis sein - dann als Sturm knapp unterhalb der Hurrikan-Schwelle.
output: Due to the forecast the hurricane should be near the largest island of Hawaii on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below hurricane strength.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Über dem Atlantik erwartete NOAA in diesem Jahr nach einer Vorhersage vom Mai eine überdurchschnittlich aktive Hurrikan-Saison.
output: According to a forecast in May the NOAA expected an above average hurricane season over the Atlantic this year.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Von Juni bis Ende November sei mit bis zu zehn Hurrikanen zu rechnen, davon könnten bis zu sechs sehr starke Wirbelstürme werden, hatte die Behörde erklärt.
output: From June to the end of November one would have to reckon with up to ten hurricanes, up to six could become very strong hurricanes, explained authorities.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Im Durchschnitt gibt es pro Jahr über dem Atlantik sechs Hurrikane, drei davon entwickeln sich zu Stürmen großer Stärke.
output: On average there are about six hurricanes over the Atlantic per year, three of them develop to storms of immense strength.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: Late-night moderator Stephen Colbert welcomed the 17 year old Thunberg in his program on Tuesday and had a lengthy interview with the Swede.

instruction:

output: In the interview she not only talked about her fight against climate changes but also her conflict with the powerful ones of the world.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Es gibt einige Dinge, die mich überrascht haben", meinte sie.
output: “There are things that surprised me”, she said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
"Wie weit Menschen gehen, um den Fokus von der Klimakrise weg zu lenken", habe sie erschüttert.
output: “How far people will go to distract from the climate crisis”, that had her baffled.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:

output: “Everything from organized hate campaigns up to threats only because a group of children turn to protests”, she said she experienced.

output: Head of states and leading politicians that make fun of them in social media or even try to silence them she finds “funny” since their reactions show her “that they have no other answer to it”.

output: At the UN summit 2019 in New York for which the activist had sailed across the Atlantic Ocean her expressive glance was caught by the cameras and was viewed by innumerable people in the Internet since then.

instruction:

Translate the following text from German to English:
Der einstige BVB-Profi steuerte beim 5:1 (1:1) -Sieg von Lazio Rom bei Hellas Verona drei Treffer bei, darunter zwei verwandelte Elfmeter in den Nachspielzeiten beider Hälften.
output: The former BVB professional contributed three goals during the 5:1 (1:1) victory over Lazio Rome in Hellas Verona, two of which were penalty kicks in the extra time of both halves.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Damit hat der 30-Jährige vom Tabellenvierten zwei Saisonspiele vor Schluss nun 34 Saisontore auf seinem Konto - genauso viele erzielte Robert Lewandowski vom FC Bayern München in der abgelaufenen Bundesligasaison.
output: In so doing, the 30 year-old from the 4th ranked team now has 34 season goals in the bank two games before the end of the season - that’s just as many as Robert Lewandowski from FC Bayern Munich had in the last Bundesliga season.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
In Italien folgt Cristiano Ronaldo mit bislang 30 Toren, der portugiesische Superstar traf mit dem Spitzenreiter am Abend noch auf Sampdoria Genua.
output: Cristiano Ronaldo in Italy is following behind with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar still meet with the leader on the evening at Sampdoria Genua.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Fleetwood-Mac-Mitgründer Peter Green gestorben
output: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green has died

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Sein Leben war wie eine Achterbahnfahrt: Nach einem rasanten Aufstieg mit Fleetwood Mac ging es steil bergab und dann langsam wieder aufwärts.
output: His life was a roller coaster ride: Following a lighting-fast assent with Fleetwood Mac, he went into a steep fall and then came slowly back up again.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Nun ist der Bluesrock-Gitarrist Peter Green im Alter von 73 Jahren gestorben.
output: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Genialer Gitarrist, Drogen-Junkie, Kult-Anhänger: Der Mitgründer der Band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, ist tot.
output: Great guitarist, drug addict, cult member: The co-founder of Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er sei im Alter von 73 Jahren friedlich im Schlaf gestorben, teilten Familienmitglieder am Samstag in einer offiziellen Stellungnahme mit, eine weitere Stellungnahme würde für die nächsten Tage angekündigt.
output: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members reported on Saturday in an official statement, a further statement was announced for the upcoming days.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Top-Musiker wie Peter Frampton würdigten Green als einen der besten Blues- und Rockgitarristen.
output: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton consider Green to be one of the best blues and rock guitarists.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mick Fleetwood sprach in einer emotionalen Reaktion von einem "monumentalen Verlust" für alle früheren und jetzigen Mitglieder der Band Fleetwood Mac.
output: In an emotional reaction, Mick Fleetwood spoke of a “monumental loss“ for all previous and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Schlagzeuger Fleetwood und der Gitarrist Green hatten die inzwischen längst legendäre Band 1967 in London gegründet, bis heute unvergessen ist sein verträumter Instrumental-Hit "Albatross".
output: The drummer Fleetwood and the guitarist Green founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, his dreamy instrumental hit “Albatross” remains unforgettable up into the current day.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Leben des Musikers ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") glich einer Achterbahnfahrt.
output: The life of the musician (“The End Of The Game”, “In The Skies”) was like a roller coaster ride.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mit Fleetwood Mac erlebte Green einen rasanten Aufstieg - die Band feierte ihre größten Erfolge aber dann ohne ihn.
output: Green experienced a lighting-fast rise as part of Fleetwood Mac, however, the band celebrated their greatest successes without him.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Es soll unter anderem Streit gegeben haben, weil Green alle Gewinne der Gruppe für wohltätige Zwecke spenden wollte.
output: Among other factors, there were fights because Green wanted to donate the profits of the group to good causes.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er begann, in weiten Gewändern und mit großem Kruzifix aufzutreten.
output: He started to appear in wide robes and with a giant crucifix.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Auch psychische Probleme sollen eine Rolle gespielt haben.
output: Mental-health issues also seemed to have played a role.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Schon drei Jahre nach der Gründung verließ Green die Band 1970.
output: Green left in 1970 just three years after founding the band.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Es folgte ein sozialer Abstieg.
output: A social descent followed.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der Bluesrock-Gitarrist litt unter Drogenmissbrauch und Schizophrenie, wie Biografen berichteten.
output: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers report.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Lange Zeit wurde Green in der Psychiatrie behandelt.
output: Green was treated in the psychiatric ward for a long time.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Während eines Großteils der 1970er Jahre verschwand der Musiker von der Bildfläche.
output: The musician disappeared from the scene for a large part of the 1970s.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Er soll zeitweise auf der Straße gelebt, als Friedhofsgärtner gearbeitet und eine Zeit lang in einem israelischen Kibbuz verbracht haben.
output: He supposedly lived on the street for a time, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent sometime in an Israeli kibbutz.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Green wurde 1946 als Sohn einer jüdischen Arbeiterfamilie im Londoner Stadtteil Bethnal Green geboren.
output: Green was born in 1946 as the son of a Jewish working-class family in the London borough of Bethnal.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Schon in jungen Jahren begeisterte er sich für US-Bluesmusiker wie B.B. King und Muddy Waters.
output: In his younger years he was already excited about US blues musicians like B.B. King and Muddy Waters.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mit elf Jahren lernte er die ersten Gitarrengriffe.
output: He learned his first guitar chords at eleven.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Im Alter von 15 Jahren begann der Teenager professionell Gitarre zu spielen und bekam fünf Jahre später die Chance, als Lead-Gitarrist für die Instrumentalband Peter B's Looners auf der Bühne zu stehen.
output: At 15 the teenager started to play professional guitar and got the chance five years later to stand on stage as the lead guitarist for the instrumental group Peter B’s Looners.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Wenig später wurde er als Ersatz für sein Idol Eric Clapton bei den Bluesbreakers engagiert.
output: A little later he was working as the stand-in for his idol Eric Clapton with the Bluesbreakers.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Mitten im Blues-Boom gründete Green im Sommer 1967 Fleetwood Mac zusammen mit seinen Bluesbreakers-Kollegen Mick Fleetwood und John McVie.
output: In the middle of the Blues Boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der von Green komponierte Song "Albatross" bescherte der Gruppe im Winter 1968/69 den ersten Nummer-1-Hit und katapultierte sie an die Spitze der britischen Musikszene.
output: “Albatross”, a song composed by Green, ensured the group their first No.1 hit in the winter of 1968/1969 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Doch der schnelle Aufstieg zeigte bald seine Schattenseiten: Green verkraftete den Medienrummel nicht, seine Experimente mit der Droge LSD wurden immer extremer.
output: The quick accent showed its dark side quickly: Green did not deal with the media circus well and his experiments with the drug LSD got progressively more extreme.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Das Leben zwischen Musik und Sucht kommentierte er später einmal in einem Interview: "Das Schlimmste, was mir im Leben passiert ist, sind die Drogen - das Beste war, einen Nummer-1-Hit zu landen".
output: He commented later in an interview about his life between music and addiction: “The worst that happened to me in life was the drugs, the best was to land the no.1 hit”.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Gegen Ende des Jahrzehnts gelang Green 1979 überraschend ein Achtungserfolg mit einem von religiösen Themen inspirierten Album.
output: At the end of the decade, Green managed a surprising, respectable achievement in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Fleetwood Mac schwammen derweil ohne ihn in neuer Formation auf einer Erfolgswelle.
output: Fleetwood Mac in the meantime floated on a wave of success in a new formation without him.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Ihr 1977 erschienenes Album "Rumours" verkaufte sich weltweit mehr als 40 Millionen Mal.
output: The 1977 album “Rumours“ sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Trotz verschiedener kleiner Solo-Erfolge gelang Green kein größeres Comeback, bis er 1996 mit einer Gruppe befreundeter Musiker neu an den Start ging.
output: In spite of small solo successes, Green never managed a great comeback, until he started anew in 1996 with a group of musician friends.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Der britische "Daily Telegraph" sprach damals von einem auf die Erde zurückgekehrten Rockstar.
output: The British “Daily Telegraph” spoke at the time from a rockstar come back from the grave.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Frei von Drogen veröffentlichte Green mit der Peter Green Splinter Group einige Alben, bis sich die Band 2004 auflöste.
output: Green released a few albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group before the band broke up in 2004.

instruction:
Translate the following text from German to English:
Für Musikexperten war er schon zu Lebzeiten eine Blues-Legende - und mit seinem sanften Sound einer der einflussreichsten Gitarristen der vergangenen Jahrzehnte.
output: He was already a blues legend for music experts during his lifetime, and an influential guitarist of past decades with his gentle sounds.
